channel.title: Editing NPC's Drops
channel.description:
I was messing around with this for a bit and I have read everything I can think of on how the drops should be. Could anyone tell me what I am doing wrong with this part? What I am doing is trying to give a good drop from the Black Demons and I am really not sure what the weight would be for example Rune Items. Btw, I am running EasyRSC v1.1
[code]<drops> <ItemDropDef> <id>181</id> <amount>1</amount> <weight>0</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>795</id> <amount>1</amount> <weight>1</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>11</id> <amount>100</amount> <weight>50</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>790</id> <amount>100</amount> <weight>5</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>1270</id> <amount>5</amount> <weight>3</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>400</id> <amount>1</amount> <weight>4</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>399</id> <amount>1</amount> <weight>5</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>404</id> <amount>1</amount> <weight>3</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>405</id> <amount>1</amount> <weight>12</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>408</id> <amount>1</amount> <weight>11</weight> </ItemDropDef> </drops>[/code]
Are my Weights wrong?
Thanks Man!

item.title: Editing NPC's Drops
item.dc:creator: @martinfin martinfin
item.description:
@martinfin wrote:

Well Sweet … Thanks Dude. I’ll work on this more. Appreciate your helping me out.

Read full topic

item.description:
@martinfin wrote:

I was messing around with this for a bit and I have read everything I can think of on how the drops should be. Could anyone tell me what I am doing wrong with this part?
